format.name: TitleFormatChecker
format.description: The argument value must contain a title wrapped in double angle brackets, such as <<poem of joy>> (everything except for the title is allowed).

fn_schema.name: fn204__0__Weather_1_GetWeather
fn_schema.description: Retrieves the weather forecast for a specified city on a particular date.

city.description: The name of the city for which weather information is requested. The argument value must contain a title wrapped in double angle brackets, such as <<poem of joy>> (everything except for the title is allowed).

date.description: The date for which weather information is requested, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current date is used.

user_queries: Hi, I'm planning a trip to Paris soon and would really appreciate it if you could provide me with the detailed weather forecast for Paris on 2024-07-21. I want to know the temperature, chance of rain, and any other relevant weather details for that particular day, as I need to pack suitable clothing and plan some outdoor activities. Could you give me all the information you have about the weather in Paris for that specific date?

I'm organizing an outdoor charity event in New York City for August 14th, 2024, and I want to make sure we're prepared for any type of weather. Can you tell me what the weather forecast looks like for New York City on 2024-08-14? Please include as much information as possible, such as expected temperatures, precipitation, humidity, and anything else that might affect the event. Thank you!

Could you please pull up the weather forecast for Tokyo for tomorrow, which is 2024-06-25? I'm particularly interested in knowing whether there will be any rain and what the temperature range will be, as I have an early morning meeting in the city. Please include any additional weather warnings or advisories if available!

I have a hiking trip planned in Cape Town, and I'm a bit concerned about the weather conditions there. Could you provide the forecast for Cape Town on 2024-09-10? I’d love to know if there’s any chance of rain, the anticipated temperature, wind speed, and any other weather factors that could impact my hike on that day.

For my upcoming business trip, I'll be in Sydney, and I need to know what to expect weather-wise. Can you give me a comprehensive weather forecast for Sydney on 2024-10-05? Specifically, I’m interested in details like maximum and minimum temperatures, likelihood of showers, humidity levels, and any unusual weather phenomena that might occur on that date.
